item.title: Init
item.description: Hello there This is my initial commit for a blog post on my site. Awesome I know. I switched to using Hugo for generating my site because I am a programmer at heart and I cannot make a site that looks good by only using HTML and CSS Anyways the initial post is going to be short as it is basically just here to be here :D Cya
item.content:
Hello there

This is my initial commit for a blog post on my site. Awesome I know.

I switched to using Hugo for generating my site because I am a programmer at heart and I cannot make a site that looks good by only using HTML and CSS

Anyways the initial post is going to be short as it is basically just here to be here :D

Cya
